com.clover.sdk.util

Enum Platform

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<Platform>
      • com.clover.sdk.util.Platform
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Platform>

    public enum Platform
extends java.lang.Enum<Platform>
    Provides information about the device currently being used.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Platform.Feature
      List of features that may be present on Clover devices.
      static class  Platform.Orientation
      The default orientation for this device, not the current orientation.
      static class  Platform.SecureProcessorPlatform
      List of secure processor platforms

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Platform.Orientation defaultOrientation()
      Get the default orientation under which this device is normally used.
      static Platform get()
      Return an instance of the Platform class for this device, if not a Clover device this will return OTHER.

      Get the default orientation for this device.
      java.lang.String getProductName()
      Get the English product name for this device if Clover, null if not a Clover device.

      Deprecated. 
      Use supportsFeature(Feature) with an argument of Platform.Feature.MOBILE_DATA.
      static boolean isClover()
      Returns true when running on Clover hardware.
      static boolean isCloverFlex()
      Consider using supportsFeature(Feature) to check device capabilities, using android.util.DisplayMetrics to check display size or using android.os.Build.VERSION.SDK_INT to check Android API level instead for better forward compatibility with new Clover hardware.

      • values

        public static Platform[] values()
        Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared. This method may be used to iterate over the constants as follows: 
        for (Platform c : Platform.values())
    System.out.println(c);
        Returns:
        an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared

      • valueOf

        public static Platform valueOf(java.lang.String name)
        Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name. The string must match exactly an identifier used to declare an enum constant in this type. (Extraneous whitespace characters are not permitted.)
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the enum constant to be returned.

        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if this enum type has no constant with the specified name
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the argument is null

      • get

        public static Platform get()
        Return an instance of the Platform class for this device, if not a Clover device this will return OTHER.

      • isClover

        public static boolean isClover()
        Returns true when running on Clover hardware.

      • isCloverStation

        public static boolean isCloverStation()
        Consider using supportsFeature(Feature) to check device capabilities, using android.util.DisplayMetrics to check display size or using android.os.Build.VERSION.SDK_INT to check Android API level instead for better forward compatibility with new Clover hardware.

      • isCloverMobile

        public static boolean isCloverMobile()
        Consider using supportsFeature(Feature) to check device capabilities, using android.util.DisplayMetrics to check display size or using android.os.Build.VERSION.SDK_INT to check Android API level instead for better forward compatibility with new Clover hardware.

        public static boolean isCloverMini()
        Consider using supportsFeature(Feature) to check device capabilities, using android.util.DisplayMetrics to check display size or using android.os.Build.VERSION.SDK_INT to check Android API level instead for better forward compatibility with new Clover hardware.

      • isSupportsCustomerMode

        @Deprecated
public static boolean isSupportsCustomerMode()
        Deprecated. Use supportsFeature(Feature) with an argument of Platform.Feature.CUSTOMER_MODE.
        Indicates if the device supports getting/setting CustomerMode state via the CustomerMode API.
        Returns:
        true if the device supports it, false otherwise

      • supportsFeature

        public static boolean supportsFeature(Platform.Feature f)
        Return true if the specified feature is supported on this device. Always returns false for OTHER.

      • defaultOrientation

        public static Platform.Orientation defaultOrientation()
        Get the default orientation under which this device is normally used.
        Returns:
        the default orientation for Clover devices, null for non-Clover devices

      • productName

        public static java.lang.String productName()
        Get the English product name for this device if Clover, null if not a Clover device.

      • isSupportsFeature

        public boolean isSupportsFeature(Platform.Feature feature)
        Return true if the specified feature is supported on this Platform instance. Always returns false for OTHER.

      • getDefaultOrientation

        public Platform.Orientation getDefaultOrientation()
        Get the default orientation for this device.
        Returns:
        the default orientation for Clover devices, null for non-Clover devices

      • getProductName

        public java.lang.String getProductName()
        Get the English product name for this device if Clover, null if not a Clover device.
        Returns:
        The Clover product name
